snippet: The Phoenix Coyotes have staged a big turnaround in a year, going from a first-round playoff ouster in 2011 to advancing to their first Western Conference finals this season after eliminating the Nashville Predators in five games.
abstract: The Phoenix Coyotes have staged a big turnaround in a year, going from a first-round playoff ouster in 2011 to advancing to their first Western Conference finals this season after eliminating the Nashville Predators in five games.

headline.main: Coyotes Defy History, Reach West Finals
